Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class MessageController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.MessageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MessageController extends Object implements Serializable
The task of this class is to verify that the format of the messages sent by the client is valid
See Also:
